name: Turtleboy: Back to School
description:
Turtleboy: Back to School is a 2D sidescroller, where the goal is to reach school before time runs out on each level. The player must avoid stationary obstacles and moving objects, all while trying to not fall to their demise. Will Turtleboy make it to school on time?

Use WASD to move where W is to jump, and A and D are to move left and right.
